name: Bebilith
languages: understands Abyssal but only speaks telepathically to its own kind

traits.name: Relentless Hunter
entries: The bebilith may use a bonus action to mark prey that it has damaged. Only one creature can be marked at a time. The bebilith always knows the exact location of the marked prey on the current plane of existence, cannot be {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} by it, and has advantage on all attack rolls against it.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The bebilith can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down, without needing to make an ability check and ignores any movement restrictions caused by webbing.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The Bebilith uses {@condition poisoned} web if it can and then makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d12 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 21 (6d6 damage) poison damage. Any creature that drops to zero hit points because it has been bit by the bebilith lights on fire and suffers 7 (2d6 damage) fire damage each round until healing is applied to them.

actions.name: Foreleg
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Poisoned Web {@recharge 5}
entries: Ranged atk +10 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. 36 (8d8 damage) poison damage, and the target is {@condition restrained} by webbing. While {@condition restrained}, the target takes 9 (2d8 damage) poison damage at the start of each of its turns and the target may then make a DC 17 Strength check to free itself from the webbing. Unlike normal webs, fire cannot burn a bebilith's webbing but if used will ignite the web inflicting an additional 3 (1d6 damage) fire damage to trapped targets.
